basics.name: MUHAMMAD UMAIR KHAN
basics.label: Lead QA Automation Engineer
basics.x_title: Leading the Industry with Innovative Automation Solutions
basics.summary: Expertly designing and implementing automated solutions for optimal efficiency and productivity. Continuously pushing boundaries with the latest technology and industry trends.

work.summary: Built a hybrid automation framework from scratch, integrating web, mobile, and API testing using Spring Boot, Selenium, Appium, and Rest Assured for STC Play and STC TV Mobile and Web App. Led automation teams for web, mobile, and backend testing. Managed a manual QA team for mobile testing. Set up Jenkins pipelines for daily test execution.
highlights: Built hybrid automation framework from scratch
Integrated web, mobile, and API testing
Led automation teams for web, mobile, and backend
Managed manual QA team for mobile testing
Set up Jenkins pipelines for daily execution

work.summary: Spearheaded end-to-end automation testing initiatives for mobile applications using Appium Selenium and Java TestNG, ensuring thorough test coverage and reliable outcomes.
highlights: Used Appium Selenium and Java TestNG

work.summary: Building Test Automation Framework for Desktop Automation using Appium, C# & Microsoft WinAppDriver. Created Test scripts using RIDE - Robot Framework Python.
highlights: Built Test Automation Framework for Desktop
Created test scripts using Robot Framework Python

work.summary: Automated the regression process with Selenium Web driver with Python along with CI/CD, where it required fewer company resources and provided a higher confidence level for release patches in web based application.
highlights: Automated regression with Selenium and Python
